{"id":958476358,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"3 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1685206761,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"16 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/958476358/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Buy Two Chocolates","memory":"46.6 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int buyChoco(vector<int>& prices, int money) {\n        sort(prices.begin(), prices.end());\n        int spent = prices[0] + prices[1];\n        if(spent > money) {\n            return money;\n        }\n        return money - spent;\n    }\n};\n\n/*\n    [3,2,3] money = 6\n    output : 1\n    \n    to minimize the sum of the prices of the two chocolates you buy!\n    \n*/","compare_result":"","title_slug":"buy-two-chocolates","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
